ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Hundreds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The range within it will see the player and start the fight (not counting vertical distance).
If this is 255, it will default to 50 (5000 units) instead.
If this is less than 50, it will default to 50 (5000 units) instead.

ParameterFields.Name: Post-Loss Spawn ID
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
If the player loses the fight against the Big Octo, this spawn ID will be where in this room the player respawns from.
If this is 255, the normal behavior for respawning the player is used instead.

ParameterFields.Name: Death Event Waits for Great Fairy
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
If this is checked, the cutscene played after the Big Octo is defeated will not end normally, and will instead wait for the Great Fairy's cutscene to start.
If there is no Great Fairy set up properly here, the game will softlock with no way to end the cutscene.
